meanings.sent1: She clerked at the store, helping customers find items.
meanings.sent2: He clerked at the library, organizing books on shelves.
meanings.sent3: The cat clerked at the fish market, trying to sell tuna cans.
meanings.sent4: The sun clerked in the sky, shining brightly on the town below.
meanings.sent5: The robot clerked efficiently, processing orders with precision.

meanings.sent1: They clerked by filing papers and answering phone calls.
meanings.sent2: The secretary clerked by typing reports and scheduling meetings.
meanings.sent3: The dog clerked by fetching pens and paper for the office.
meanings.sent4: The moon clerked by illuminating the night with its gentle light.
meanings.sent5: The machine clerked tirelessly, completing tasks without error.

meanings.sent1: She clerked at the hotel, assisting guests with check-ins.
meanings.sent2: He clerked at the courthouse, helping people with legal documents.
meanings.sent3: The parrot clerked at the bank, squawking out account balances.
meanings.sent4: The wind clerked through the trees, rustling leaves in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The computer clerked smoothly, processing transactions without delay.

meanings.definition: To keep records as a clerk.
meanings.sent1: They clerked by entering data into the computer system.
meanings.sent2: The archivist clerked by cataloging historical documents.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel clerked by storing nuts in a neat, organized manner.
meanings.sent4: The river clerked by flowing steadily, recording the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The machine clerked meticulously, documenting every detail accurately.
